item.title: what meta does to retain me
item.description: (thoughts are my own and not representative of those of my employer) Lots of people have described this topic more eloquently than I can. Nothing in this post will merit a NYT article and nothing, really, will be groundbreaking. But a recent blog post by a friend about why he left{:target=“blank”} gave me pause â€“ why do I stay here instead of finding the next great thing? If my resume is any indication, I’m not afraid to jump ship when a big opportunity presents itself; I have wondered time and again if I’m flakey or distractable or if I just don’t have the grit to stick it out through hard things.
